value.stringValue: We couldn't find where this was launched from

rules.name: Referrer_needed
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6)) OR (2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6))) AND 7
rules.label: Referrer needed

Flow.description: Update and manage lead source and referral information

formulas.name: referrerPrompt
formulas.expression: IF(!ISBLANK({!referrerValue}), "You can update the referrer below.", "Please record the referrer below.")

Flow.label: Lead | Manage Lead Source

fields.name: LeadSourceNotes
fields.helpText: Any notes relevant in supporting lead source.

fields.name: LeadSourceNotesRequired
fields.helpText: Any notes relevant in supporting lead source.

validationRule.errorMessage: Notes cannot exceed 255 characters

fields.name: mobileOrEmail
fields.helpText: Enter an email or mobile to search on. Mobile numbers must be in international format (e.g. start with +44).
